医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究人员发现了一种有前途的青光眼细胞替代疗法新策略青光眼是全球失明的主要原因之一，而由于视网膜神经节细胞 (RGC) 损失而导致的视力丧失目前无法通过任何治疗来逆转。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231117/Researchers-identify-a-promising-new-strategy-for-glaucoma-cell-replacement-therapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231117/Researchers-identify-a-promising-new-strategy-for-glaucoma-cell-replacement-therapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ed67f152-0b12-4d22-b34b-5a010c2d201b Fri, 17 Nov 2023 20:56:54 -0500 Researchers identify a promising new strategy for glaucoma cell replacement therapy
RIT 科学家荣获 NIH 奖，以支持构建下一代药物的研究罗彻斯特理工学院化学与材料科学学院助理教授埃米利亚诺·布里尼 (Emiliano Brini) 获得了美国国立卫生研究院 (NIH) 颁发的奖项，以支持他构建下一代药物的研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231117/RIT-scientist-earns-NIH-award-to-support-research-on-building-the-next- Generation-of-drugs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231117/RIT-scientist-earns-NIH-award-to-support-research-on-building-the-next- Generation-of-drugs.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f8ec833b-d6ea-4077-b586-04740ef013de Fri, 17 Nov 2023 20:30:18 -0500 RIT scientist earns NIH award to support research on building the next generation of drugs
揭示免疫系统对纳米颗粒药物输送的反应为了减少与化疗相关的副作用，研究人员研究了可以将更多药物直接输送到肿瘤的输送系统的使用。德克萨斯理工大学健康科学中心 (TTUHSC) 杰里·霍奇药学院免疫治疗和生物技术系的 Ninh (Irene) La-Beck 药学博士就是其中一位研究人员。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231117/Unraveling-the-immune-systems-response-to-nanoarticle-drug-delivery.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231117/Unraveling-the-immune-systems-response-to-nanoarticle-drug-delivery.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f0616bd2-612d-4479-b7a6-de78533d0a07 Fri, 17 Nov 2023 20:21:44 -0500 Unraveling the immune system's response to nanoparticle drug delivery
评估 DDX53 作为潜在的早期食管癌抗原2023 年 11 月 10 日，Oncoscience（第 10 卷）发表了一篇新的研究论文，题为“癌症睾丸抗原 DDX53 作为潜在的早期食管癌抗原的免疫信息学评估”。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231117/Assessing-DDX53-as-a-潜在-early-esophageal-cancer-antigen.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231117/Assessing-DDX53-as-a-潜在-early-esophageal-cancer-antigen.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6b3b819c-ed06-4fd3-8c83-5e94b42960db Fri, 17 Nov 2023 20:15:46 -0500 Assessing DDX53 as a potential early esophageal cancer antigen
新的社会保障报告显示日益严重的超额支付问题超过 $23B社会保障管理局本周发布的一份新财务报告显示，该机构的多付问题范围持续扩大。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231117/New-Social-Security-report-shows-having-over payment-problem-tops-2423B.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231117/New-Social-Security-report-shows-having-over payment-problem-tops-2423B.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=98a7e7fe-38bd-4e39-8f48-267c64b11c20 Fri, 17 Nov 2023 20:07:18 -0500 New Social Security report shows growing overpayment problem tops $23B
新报告强调迫切需要提高阿塞拜疆妇女对地中海贫血的认识全球 5.2% 的人口患有血红蛋白异常，每年导致 300,000 至 400,000 名儿童出生时患有严重的血红蛋白病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231117/New-report-highlights-urgent-need-to-improve-thalassemia-awareness-among-Azerbaijan-women.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231117/New-report-highlights-urgent-need-to-improve-thalassemia-awareness-among-Azerbaijan-women.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=486b3007-d7db-40e2-a711-04302dbbf2ac Fri, 17 Nov 2023 14:57:46 -0500 New report highlights urgent need to improve thalassemia awareness among Azerbaijan women
杜克大学医院连续九次获得 Leapfrog Group 颁发的“A”级评级杜克大学医院、杜克地区医院和杜克罗利医院连续九个评分周期在患者安全和减少可避免伤害方面获得 Leapfrog Group 的最高分。Leapfrog Group 是一家由雇主和其他健康福利大型购买者运营的独立全国性非营利组织。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231117/Duke-hospitals-receive-9-consecutive-A-grades-from-Leapfrog-Group.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231117/Duke-hospitals-receive-9-consecutive-A-grades-from-Leapfrog-Group.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=afddad42-20bd-4141-a86f-4aeebb7ac5dc Fri, 17 Nov 2023 14:52:57 -0500 Duke hospitals receive nine consecutive "A" grades from Leapfrog Group
CMA 明确联合疗法合作，以加快患者获得重要治疗的速度竞争与市场管理局 (CMA) 今天发表声明，澄清从事“联合疗法”的竞争制药公司之间的某些类型的合作不会优先接受调查，从而使制药公司更容易合作开发重要的治疗方法在 NHS 中使用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231117/CMA-clarizes-cooperation-on-combination-therapies-to-speed-up-patent-access-to-vital-treatments.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231117/CMA-clarizes-cooperation-on-combination-therapies-to-speed-up-patent-access-to-vital-treatments.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=78df1ce0-decf-4bd6-b819-b2e90147137b Fri, 17 Nov 2023 14:45:00 -0500 CMA clarifies cooperation on combination therapies to speed up patient access to vital treatments
多不饱和脂肪酸与骨关节炎之间是否存在因果关系？多不饱和脂肪酸（PUFA）对膝关节和髋关节骨关节炎（OA）的因果影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231117/Is-there-a-causal-link- Between-polyunaturated-fatty-acids-and-osteoarthritis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231117/Is-there-a-causal-link- Between-polyunaturated-fatty-acids-and-osteoarthritis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e55f5606-fefc-46a8-b26b-4ccbfc909fab Fri, 17 Nov 2023 08:10:00 -0500 Is there a causal link between polyunsaturated fatty acids and osteoarthritis?
食用 UPF 会增加患癌症和心脏代谢多种疾病的风险UPF 消耗与癌症、心血管疾病和 2 型糖尿病之间的关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231117/Conspiration-of-UPFs-increases-the-risk-of-cancer-and-cardiometabolic-multimorbidity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231117/Conspiration-of-UPFs-increases-the-risk-of-cancer-and-cardiometabolic-multimorbidity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=467edbe7-3af4-4bfc-b435-8c4e1dd01b85 Fri, 17 Nov 2023 07:20:00 -0500 Consumption of UPFs increases the risk of cancer and cardiometabolic multimorbidity
